name: French Macaroons
description: Scents: A great set of 4 different fragrances! Green = Sweet Almond, Orange = Orange Sherbet, Pink = Strawberry, Brown = Dark Chocolate I don't know about you, but I LOVE French macaroons, especially their eye-catching array of pastel colors, which is what I've tried to re-create for you with this set! 9.5 oz total, comes packaged in a clear acrylic box and scallop label, as shown Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Brown Oxide, Chromium Green Oxide, Red #30, D&C Orange no.5

name: Hot Cocoa
description: This smells JUST like a steaming mug of hot cocoa! With top notes of nutty almond, baking chocolate, powdered sugar, and rich vanilla, this soap is sure to please. And you simply can't have hot cocoa (soap) without a handful of mini (soap) marshmallows on top, right? 3.75 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Brown Oxide

name: Pumpkin Pie
description: Scent: Pumpkin Spice NEW for this holiday season! My husband LOVES pumpkin pie, so I just had to make this soap! It smells strongly of pumpkin and all the warm and toasty spices used in pumpkin pie. I topped it with a dollop of whipped cream and a pecan (both made of soap, of course!) to give it an extra festive look. 5.5 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Brown Oxide, Yellow Oxide, D&C Orange no.5

name: Chai Tea Latte
description: Scent: Chai Tea with citrus notes of Bergamot and Sicily Lemon. Also has base notes of Nutmeg, Cinnamon, Tahitian Vanilla, and a bit of Allspice. This sweet, buttery fragrance has a touch of spice that will surely warm you right up! This cute soap is made to look just like a little cup of chai tea, complete with a white, soapy foam layer and sprinkled with real cocoa powder to finish it off! 3 oz. Comes individually wrapped with a handmade wraparound label, as shown. Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Iron Oxide, Cocoa Powder

name: Chocolate Bar
description: Scent: Choose between Dark Chocolate or Mint Chocolate! This chocolate bar not only looks just like a real bar of chocolate, but it smells deliciously like real chocolate, as well! (Note: It won’t taste like chocolate, though, so please don’t eat your soap!) 4 oz. Comes individually wrapped with a handmade wraparound kraft label, as shown. Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Iron Oxide, Chromium Green Oxide

name: Cupcake
description: With cupcakes being so popular, why not have a cupcake soap to match? I guarantee it will last longer than a real cupcake, and no calories to count, either! This soap is the actual size of a real cupcake, with an extra tall swirl of frosting on top. The frosting is made completely of glycerin soap, not whipped soap, so it will last even longer! Bubblegum Yum, smells just like mouth-smackin’ pink bubblegum with faint, sweet notes of vanilla. Buttercream Snickerdoodle This is a sweet and yummy fragrance that’s sure to make you swoon! It contains rich caramel and cream notes, with plenty of base vanilla and a hint of nutmeg and praline. Turkish Coffee Coffee lover? Then this is a cupcake for you! It smells like a strongly brewed cup of joe with a rich, chocolatey finish. Happy Birthday Cupcake (Cream Cheese Frosting) This sweet scent contains notes of freshly churned butter, buttercream, cream cheese, and a warm after-note of smooth butterscotch. Delish! Lemon Poppyseed This soap is fragranced with sweet Meyer lemon, with ripe pineapple and tropical floral notes to round it out. I also added real poppyseeds to the frosting for a bit of exfoliation! Lime-Coconut The bottom part is fragranced with refreshing, light lime, while the frosting smells like delicious, rich island coconut. If you like the scent of coconut, then you will LOVE this cupcake! Mint Chip Mint Chocolate-y goodness! Enjoy notes of sugar, whipped cream, chocolate truffle, and peppermint candy, MMMM! Sweet Strawberry and Vanilla A classic, sweet and mouth-watering strawberry scent for the frosting, with a realistic, rich Vanilla scented "cake" bottom! 5.25 oz. Comes individually wrapped and packaged in a clear box with crinkle shred and silver elastic ribbon/bow. Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, skin-safe Colorants, Jojoba Esters (in Birthday, Bubblegum, Strawberry, and Buttercream cupcakes) Glitter (in Birthday and Strawberry cupcakes)

name: Ice Cream Cone
description: If you ever wanted to bathe yourself in ice cream, now's your chance! This soft serve cone is made completely of soap and smells as delicious as the real thing! (Tip: Cut it half with a kitchen knife for easier use) Choose your scent/color in the options menu! Coconut This cone smells like rich and tropical island coconut! Creamsicle A classic, summer scent of warm, creamy Vanilla blended with fresh, sparkling orange sherbet! Lemon This soap is fragranced with sweet Meyer lemon, with ripe pineapple and tropical floral notes to round it out. Strawberry A classic, sweet and mouth-watering strawberry scent. 5.25 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, skin-safe Colorants

name: Milk & Cookies
description: Scent: Sweet Vanilla, Milk & Honey Choose between a chocolate chip soap cookie, or a chocolate sandwich soap cookie dipped in "milk"! 3.5 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Brown Oxide, Yellow Oxide

name: Mixed Berry Tart
description: Scent: Smells like Blueberries - the yummy, sweet dessert topping kind, of course! This berry tart looks SO real! The scalloped bottom is topped with a mix of soapy blackberries, raspberries, and blueberries. 4 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Red #30, Iron Oxide, Violet, Ultramarine Blue

name: Over the Rainbow
description: Scent: An energizing blend of Citrus, including Grapefruit, Lemon, and Lime, with hints of fresh Cucumber and Jasmine. This soap was inspired by the seven layer rainbow cake! Colorful layers of soap topped with fluffy whipped soap "frosting" and rainbow jojoba beads. 4 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Jojoba Esters, Red #30, Ultramarine Blue, Chromium Green Oxide, Yellow Oxide, D&C Orange no.5

name: Peppermint Swirl
description: Scent: Top notes of Spearmint, Peppermint, and exotic Water Mint, finished up with a touch of creamy Vanilla. Get yourself minty clean with this giant peppermint candy soap! 3 oz. Comes individually wrapped in cellophane and ribbon as shown Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, skin-safe Colorants

name: Slice of Pie
description: Blueberry Pie Loaded with tons of soapy blueberry embeds, this pie soap smells like sweet canned blueberry pie filling! Cherry Pie This slice has a traditional lattice top with lots and lots of soapy cherry embeds inside (look closely, you can see them from the side!) And it smells like sweet canned cherry pie filling and almond extract. Coconut Cream Pie This is a yummy tropical coconut scent! And what's pie without a dollop of whipped cream on top? Hot Apple Pie Amazingly, this smells just like apple pie - apples with strong notes of brown sugar and cinnamon! And I had to make it with the traditional lattice top, plus pretty crinkle cuts of soap in the filling to emulate apple slices! Lemon Meringue This sweet, fruity, and bright lemon scent will surely win you lemon lovers over! It even has a fluffy, whipped soap top to make it look just like meringue! Strawberry Cheesecake This fun pie soap smells like sweet strawberries mixed with cream cheese and frosting. I topped it off with a strawberry and lots of strawberry "glaze" dripping down the sides to make it look extra mouth-watering! 5 - 5.5oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, skin-safe Colorants, Strawberry Seeds (Straw Cheesecake), Cinnamon (Apple Pie)

name: Two Scoops, Please!
description: Scent: Creamsicle - that delicious blend of sparkling orange and warm vanilla, YUM! Don't you just love eating an ice cream cone on a hot summer day? And not one scoop, but TWO scoops please! 3.75 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, Poppyseeds, Mica, Ultramarine Pink, Chromium Green Oxide, Yellow Oxide

name: "Beary" Clean
description: Scent: Watermelon, a favorite scent of kids and adults at our local craft fairs! Many say it smells just like Watermelon Jolly Ranchers! This soap uses a super clear base, all the better to show off the little, colorful soapy gummy bears floating around inside! Note: There are not actual gummy bears inside - they are made of soap. 3.5 oz Ingredients: Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Deionized Water, Glycerin, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Myristate, TEA Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, BHT, Sodium Metabisulfite, Fragrance, Polyester-3, D&C Orange No.5, Yellow-7, Green Oxide, Red #30, Ultramarine Pink, Titanium Dioxide

name: Lil' Builder
description: Scent:Monkey Farts (aka Banana!) Your kid(s) will go bananas, not only over the fun, tropical scent, but the familiar colorful Lego bricks embedded in this soap! I used a super clear base so you can really see all the various soapy Lego's inside. This should definitely encourage your little ones to wash their hands or take a bath! 3.75 oz Ingredients: Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Deionized Water, Glycerin, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Myristate, TEA Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, BHT, Sodium Metabisulfite, Fragrance, Polyester-3, D&C Orange No.5, Yellow-7, Green Oxide, Red #30, Ultramarine Pink, Ultramarine Blue, Titanium Dioxide

name: Mr. Roboto
description: Scent: Monkey Farts aka Banana! A very fruity and tropical scent that kids love. Your little one will surely jump into the bath once they have their own tiny robot army waiting for them! Note: Robots are one-sided only, the back is flat 3.25 oz total 1 set of 4 robots in a clear bag tied with a polka dot ribbon. Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, skin-safe colorants

name: Beer Sampler
description: Scent: The "light beer" is Honey Ale, a sweet and fruity mix of crisp apple, sparkling citrus, honey, and spiced vanilla. The "dark beer" is Oatmeal Stout, a full-bodied blend of oatmeal, butterscotch, almond, and rich vanilla. Can't decide which scent to get? Try out two in one! Each soap has a fluffy, whipped soap top to emulate beer froth. This is a great gift for the men (or beer-lovin' women) in your life! 6.75 oz. Packaged in a clear box as shown. Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Honey, Oats, Fragrance, Yellow Oxide, Brown Oxide

name: Honey Ale
description: Scent: A sweet and fruity mix of crisp apple, sparkling citrus, honey, and spiced vanilla. This is my take on a "beer" soap! It is topped with a fluffy, whipped soap top to emulate beer froth. (Note: Since the top is whipped, it has a spongy texture and will wear down faster than the bottom layer but it will still last for a few washes!) 4 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Honey, Fragrance, Yellow Oxide

name: Oatmeal Stout
description: Scent: A full-bodied blend of oatmeal, butterscotch, almond, and rich vanilla. This is my take on a dark "beer" soap! It is topped with a fluffy, whipped soap top to emulate beer froth. (Note: Since the top is whipped, it has a spongy texture and will wear down faster than the bottom layer but it will still last for a few washes!) 4 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Oats, Fragrance, Brown Oxide

name: Well, Hello There!
description: Scent: An excellent compromise between the tart bite of Cranberries and the sweet, mild allure of Fig, made even more striking by a smattering of Blood Orange and Pink Grapefruit notes to the mix. Oh, fancy meeting you here! I'm surprised you recognized me. After all, I'm using my mustache soap! 3.75 oz Ingredients: Glycerin, Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Lauric Acid, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, EDTA, Fragrance, Mica, Iron Oxide
